short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your quickest canvas for thought. Capture ideas and notes in seconds from the side panel!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture fleeting ideas and notes in seconds with Napkin notes. Press Alt + X to open the side panel and jot down key details in the text field
💡 Pro tip: Use dividers and markdown such as section headers to keep your thoughts nice and organised! 

Features:
⚡  Hotkey shortcuts
📌  Notes pinned across tabs
💚  Minimal but customisable UI
💾  Auto-saves locally
🔒  100% private - no log in required


v2 Update - October 2024 🚀
✨ Fresh new design with more customisability
🎨 More markdown options including section header, highlight, and colour text red
🖼 Image support! 
 🗣 Added link to provide feedback and feature requests
🐜 Bug fixes - significantly increased notes capacity


What's next? You decide 👀 
Use the feedback button in the extension to let me know which of the follow features would be most valuable for you!
• Create bullet point list
• Multiple notes instead of a single large note
• Customise shortcut to open the side panel (FYI you can use chrome://extensions/shortcuts for now) 
• Customise background and font colours
• Something else? Get in touch :)



I'm always keen to hear your thoughts and ideas - use the feedback button in the app to get in touch :)
